item.text: The Lord spoke to Moses and Aaron, saying to them,

“<st data-num="01696" class="">Tell</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st>: ‘<st data-num="02063" class="">This</st> is the <st data-num="02416 0834">kind of creature</st> you may <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> from among <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0929" class="">animals</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> are <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>.

You may <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> among the <st data-num="0929" class="">animals</st> that has a <st data-num="06536" class="">divided</st> <st data-num="06541" class="">hoof</st> (the <st data-num="06541" class="">hooves</st> are <st data-num="08156" class="">completely split</st> <st data-num="08157" class="">in two</st><n id="1" />) and that also <st data-num="05927" class="">chews</st> the <st data-num="01625" class="">cud</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="0389" class="">However</st>, you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">these</st><n id="1" /> from among those that <st data-num="05927" class="">chew</st> the <st data-num="01625" class="">cud</st> and have <st data-num="06536" class="">divided</st> <st data-num="06541" class="">hooves</st>: The <st data-num="01581" class="">camel</st> is <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st> to you<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">chews</st> the <st data-num="01625" class="">cud</st><n id="3" /> even though its <st data-num="06541" class="">hoof</st> is <st data-num="0369" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06536" class="">divided</st>.<n id="4" />

The <st data-num="08227" class="">rock badger</st><n id="1" /> is <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st> to you <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">chews</st> the <st data-num="01625" class="">cud</st> even though its <st data-num="06541" class="">hoof</st> is <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06536" class="">divided</st>.

The <st data-num="0768" class="">hare</st> is <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st> to you <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">chews</st> the <st data-num="01625" class="">cud</st> even though its <st data-num="06541" class="">hoof</st> is <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06536" class="">divided</st>.

The <st data-num="02386" class="">pig</st> is <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st> to you <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">its</st> <st data-num="06541" class="">hoof</st> is <st data-num="06536" class="">divided</st> (the <st data-num="06541" class="">hoof</st> is <st data-num="08156" class="">completely split</st> <st data-num="08157" class="">in two</st><n id="1" />) , even though <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01641" class="">chew</st> the <st data-num="01625" class="">cud</st>.<n id="2" />
You must not eat from their meat, and you must not touch their carcasses; they are unclean to you.
“‘These you can eat from all creatures that are in the water: Any creatures in the water that have both fins and scales, whether in the seas or in the streams, you may eat.

But <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> creatures <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> do <st data-num="0369" class="">not have</st> both <st data-num="05579" class="">fins</st> and <st data-num="07193" class="">scales</st>, whether in the <st data-num="03220" class="">seas</st> or in the <st data-num="05158" class="">streams</st>, from <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="08318" class="">swarming things</st> of the <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st> and from <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="02416" class="">living</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">creatures</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> are in the <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>, are <st data-num="08263" class="">detestable</st> to you.

Since they <st data-num="01961" class="">are</st> <st data-num="08263" class="">detestable</st> to you, you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> their <st data-num="01320" class="">meat</st>, and their <st data-num="05038" class="">carcass</st> you must <st data-num="08262" class="">detest</st>.
Any creature in the water that does not have both fins and scales is detestable to you.
“‘These you are to detest from among the birds—they must not be eaten, because they are detestable: the griffon vulture, the bearded vulture, the black vulture,
the <st data-num="01676" class="">kite</st>, the <st data-num="0344" class="">buzzard</st> of any <st data-num="04327" class="">kind</st>,<n id="1" />
<st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="04327" class="">kind</st> of <st data-num="06158" class="">crow</st>,<n id="1" />

the <st data-num="01323 03284">eagle owl</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="08464" class="">short-eared owl</st>, the <st data-num="07828" class="">long-eared owl</st>, the <st data-num="05322" class="">hawk</st> of any <st data-num="04327" class="">kind</st>,
the <st data-num="03563" class="">little owl</st>, the <st data-num="07994" class="">cormorant</st>, the <st data-num="03244" class="">screech owl</st>,
the <st data-num="08580" class="">white owl</st>, the <st data-num="06893" class="">scops owl</st>, the <st data-num="07360" class="">osprey</st>,
the stork, the heron of any kind, the hoopoe, and the bat.
“‘Every winged swarming thing that walks on all fours is detestable to you.

<st data-num="0389" class="">However</st>, <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> you may <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> from <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05775" class="">winged</st> <st data-num="08318" class="">swarming things</st> that <st data-num="01980" class="">walk</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="0702" class="">all fours</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> have <st data-num="04605 07272">jointed</st> <st data-num="03767" class="">legs</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="05425" class="">hop</st> <st data-num="02004" class="">with</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>.

<st data-num="0428" class="">These</st> you may <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> from <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st>:<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0697" class="">locust</st> of any <st data-num="04327" class="">kind</st>, the <st data-num="05556" class="">bald locust</st> of any <st data-num="04327" class="">kind</st>, the <st data-num="02728" class="">cricket</st> of any <st data-num="04327" class="">kind</st>, the <st data-num="02284" class="">grasshopper</st> of any <st data-num="04327" class="">kind</st>.
But any other winged swarming thing that has four legs is detestable to you.
“‘By these you defile yourselves—anyone who touches their carcass will be unclean until the evening,
and anyone who carries their carcass must wash his clothes and will be unclean until the evening.
“‘All animals that divide the hoof, but it is not completely split in two, and do not chew the cud are unclean to you; anyone who touches them becomes unclean.

<st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> that <st data-num="01980" class="">walk</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> their <st data-num="03709" class="">paws</st> among <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="02416" class="">creatures</st> that <st data-num="01980" class="">walk</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="0702" class="">all fours</st><n id="1" /> are <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st> to you. <st data-num="03605" class="">Anyone</st> who <st data-num="05060" class="">touches</st> their <st data-num="05038" class="">carcass</st> will <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="06153" class="">evening</st>,
and the one who carries their carcass must wash his clothes and be unclean until the evening; they are unclean to you.
“‘Now this is what is unclean to you among the swarming things that swarm on the land: the rat, the mouse, the large lizard of any kind,

the <st data-num="0604" class="">Mediterranean gecko</st>, the <st data-num="03581" class="">spotted lizard</st>, the <st data-num="03911" class="">wall gecko</st>, the <st data-num="02546" class="">skink</st>, and the <st data-num="08580" class="">chameleon</st>.

<st data-num="0428" class="">These</st> are the ones that are <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st> to you among <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="08318" class="">swarming things</st>. <st data-num="03605" class="">Anyone</st> who <st data-num="05060" class="">touches</st> these creatures<n id="1" /> when they <st data-num="04194" class="">die</st> will <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="06153" class="">evening</st>.

Also, <st data-num="03605" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> <st data-num="05307" class="">fall</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st><n id="1" /> when they <st data-num="04194" class="">die</st> will <st data-num="02930" class="">become unclean</st>—<st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st> <st data-num="03627" class="">vessel</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="0899" class="">garment</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="05785" class="">article of leather</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="08242" class="">sackcloth</st>. <st data-num="03605" class="">Any</st> such <st data-num="03627" class="">vessel</st> with <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> <st data-num="04399" class="">work</st> is <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> must be <st data-num="0935" class="">immersed</st> in <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st><n id="2" /> and will <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="06153" class="">evening</st>. Then it will <st data-num="02891" class="">become clean</st>.

As for <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> <st data-num="02789" class="">clay</st> <st data-num="03627" class="">vessel</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> <st data-num="05307" class="">fall</st> <st data-num="0413 08432">into</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">everything</st> in <st data-num="08432" class="">it</st><n id="2" /> will <st data-num="02930" class="">become unclean</st>, and you must <st data-num="07665" class="">break</st> it.

<st data-num="03605" class="">Any</st> <st data-num="0400" class="">food</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> may be <st data-num="0398" class="">eaten</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> becomes <st data-num="0935" class="">soaked</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">with</st> <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="02930" class="">become unclean</st>. <st data-num="03605" class="">Anything</st> <st data-num="04945 0834 08354">drinkable</st><n id="2" /> in <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> such <st data-num="03627" class="">vessel</st> will <st data-num="02930" class="">become unclean</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="03605" class="">Anything</st> their <st data-num="05038" class="">carcass</st> may <st data-num="05307" class="">fall</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> will <st data-num="02930" class="">become unclean</st>. An <st data-num="08574" class="">oven</st> or <st data-num="03600" class="">small stove</st> must be <st data-num="05422" class="">smashed to pieces</st>; <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> are <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st>, and they will <st data-num="01961" class="">stay</st> <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st><n id="1" /> to you.

<st data-num="0389" class="">However</st>, a <st data-num="04599" class="">spring</st> or a <st data-num="0953" class="">cistern</st> which <st data-num="04723" class="">collects</st> <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="02889" class="">clean</st>, but one who <st data-num="05060" class="">touches</st> the creature’s <st data-num="05038" class="">carcass</st> will <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st>.

Now, <st data-num="03588" class="">if</st> such a <st data-num="05038" class="">carcass</st> <st data-num="05307" class="">falls</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> <st data-num="02221" class="">sowing</st> <st data-num="02233" class="">seed</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> is to be <st data-num="02232" class="">sown</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> is <st data-num="02889" class="">clean</st>,
but if water is put on the seed and such a carcass falls on it, it is unclean to you.
“‘Now if an animal that you may eat dies, whoever touches its carcass will be unclean until the evening.

One who <st data-num="0398" class="">eats</st> from its <st data-num="05038" class="">carcass</st> must <st data-num="03526" class="">wash</st> his <st data-num="0899" class="">clothes</st> and <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="06153" class="">evening</st>, and whoever <st data-num="05375" class="">carries</st> its <st data-num="05038" class="">carcass</st> must <st data-num="03526" class="">wash</st> his <st data-num="0899" class="">clothes</st> and <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="06153" class="">evening</st>.

<st data-num="03605" class="">Every</st> <st data-num="08318" class="">swarming thing</st> that <st data-num="08317" class="">swarms</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> is <st data-num="08263">detestable</st>; it must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="0398" class="">eaten</st>.

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">anything</st> that <st data-num="01980" class="">crawls</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> its <st data-num="01512" class="">belly</st> or <st data-num="03605" class="">anything</st> that <st data-num="01980" class="">walks</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="0702" class="">all fours</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">or</st> on <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> <st data-num="07235" class="">number</st> of <st data-num="07272" class="">legs</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="08318" class="">swarming things</st> that <st data-num="08317" class="">swarm</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> are <st data-num="08263" class="">detestable</st>.

Do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08262" class="">make</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">yourselves</st> <st data-num="08262" class="">detestable</st> by <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> of the <st data-num="08318 08317">swarming things</st>.<n id="1" /> You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02930" class="">defile</st> yourselves by them and <st data-num="02933" class="">become unclean</st> by them,
for I am the Lord your God, and you are to sanctify yourselves and be holy because I am holy. You must not defile yourselves by any of the swarming things that creep on the ground,
for I am the Lord who brought you up from the land of Egypt to be your God, and you are to be holy because I am holy.

<st data-num="02063" class="">This</st> is the <st data-num="08451" class="">law</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="0929" class="">land animals</st>, the <st data-num="05775" class="">birds</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="02416" class="">living</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">creatures</st> that <st data-num="07430" class="">move</st> in the <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05315" class="">creatures</st><n id="2" /> that <st data-num="08317" class="">swarm</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>,
to distinguish between the unclean and the clean, between the living creatures that may be eaten and the living creatures that must not be eaten.’”
